page.title: 20LIFE STYLES
page.content: Children in Class 2 5-7years like similar foods.Some families prefer not to eat meat.Breakfast:Cup of tea with milk,fruitjuice,cereal such as coco- pops with fresh milk delivered daily by the milkman,toast and honey.School dinners come in containers from Faversham.The favourite is roast pork and vegetables with milk shake and biscuits.For packed lunches children bring sandwiches,salad,crisps,sweets. At home for tea many like fish fingers chips,baked beans,peas,and doughnuts. Some have Pizza or roasd meat potatoes and cabbage. Other favourites are stuffed peppers,steak and kidney pie, spaghetti,bananas and strawberries. Families cook by electricity,no gas in Throwley,a few use microwave ovens.We shop in Faversham or Canterbury.Meat vegetables and fruit or frozen.Other items are in packets or tins.
